original_title: 野村家三代 パリに舞う～万作・萬斎・裕基、未来へ
overview: The three generations of the Nomura family - Mansaku, Mansai and Yuki - who carry the 650-year history of Kyogen and pass it on to the future, perform the ultimate difficult piece, Sanbaso, in Paris. The film follows the 'challenge' of the three generations of the Nomura family, each of whom is living in the present.
title: The Three Generations of the Nomura Kyogen Family
